text: Pål Sandli (born 1 July 1957) is a Norwegian rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Norway Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Drammen
title: Pål Sandli
